EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations - You're invited to be a CHANGEMAKER
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
CONGRATULATIONS!
Thanks for letting us know you want to make a huge difference - to yourself and to other young people.
You've been selected to become an accredited Changemaker with Bite The Ballot!
In order to take part, you need to attend training.
Your training session is tomorrow, Tuesday 15th December 2015!
TIME:
6:00pm -7:30pm
PLACE:
The Challenge 7th Floor Assessment Space Elizabeth House (North Tower) York Road Waterloo London SE1 7NQ
Places are limited, so please confirm your attendance by emailing or texting (info below).
See you there!
Megan Howells Graduate Programme Associate Manager The Challenge megan.howells@the-challenge.org 07587 037 601
